Mitsubishi Tanabe Pharma

https://www.mt-pharma.co.jp/e/
about exhibitor

Mitsubishi Tanabe Pharma Corporation is a Japanese pharmaceuticals company, a subsidiary of Mitsubishi Chemical Holdings Corporation. With over 350 years of experience, MTPC strive to be a global research-driven company that is trusted by society.

Mitsubishi Tanabe Pharma Corporation is a Japanese pharmaceuticals company, a subsidiary of Mitsubishi Chemical Holdings Corporation.
